feed.title: Lightning Developer Summit #2: Adelaide, Australia 2018-10-08 and 2018-10-09

entry.title: Lightning Developer Summit #2: Adelaide, Australia 2018-10-08 and 2018-10-09
entry.summary: The message is an announcement that the date for a meeting has been changed to November. Despite the change in date, the meeting will still be held in the same location and discussions will continue as planned. The agenda for the meeting is yet to be finalized but will be closer to the date of the meeting.The organizer of the meeting, Rusty, is currently scouting for specific locations suitable for 15-30 people, and will inform the group once a final decision has been made. He also requests that attendees RSVP.Overall, the message serves as an update to those who were planning to attend the meeting, informing them of the change in date and providing information on the current preparations being made for the event.
